about_the_game:
Emerge from the spooky shadows with the Living Doll Pack! This spine-chilling pack includes the eerie Dollface Dahlia outfit and intimidating Meat Cleaver Melee.

This Pack Contains:
- Dollface Dahlia Outfit
- Meat Cleaver Melee
detailed_description:
Emerge from the spooky shadows with the Living Doll Pack! This spine-chilling pack includes the eerie Dollface Dahlia outfit and intimidating Meat Cleaver Melee.

This Pack Contains:

- Meat Cleaver Melee

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Emerge from the spooky shadows with the Living Doll Pack! This spine-chilling pack includes the eerie Dollface Dahlia outfit and intimidating Meat Cleaver Melee.
